body_html:
Hi @nectario ,
take a look a the script they are using to build the cpu one. It should build both java and c interface
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/libtensorflow_cpu.sh

modify the script, change the line that calls configure cpu to configure gpu in the script.(the function is in another script). Later on you can call the script using bash to build.

Before you build, also change the path to the GPU libraries in these two scripts, which contains stuff called by the previous script
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/common_env.sh
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/bazel/bazel_test_lib.sh

Then install the bazel and all other stuff needed for bazel, including some missing command tools maybe.

Then build!
